snippet: The moment called for celebration, maybe even a hint of introspection. Mike Tomlin was having none of it....
lead_paragraph: The moment called for celebration, maybe even a hint of introspection. Mike Tomlin was having none of it.

headline.main: 'Chameleon' Tomlin Hardly Reveling in Success With Steelers
headline.print_headline: 'Chameleon' Tomlin Hardly Reveling in Success With Steelers
